reviews: Took our first Budweiser tour last weekend, what a great experience!!  Our tour guide Elizabeth was the best, very knowledgeable and personable. Will definitely request her for our next tour. We can't wait to come back again!!!

My friends and I went on Saturday evening and really loved walking around looking at all the lights and enjoying watching the aerialists, and mostly noticing that everyone - adults and children alike - seemed like they were enjoying the festivities of the season. People were all in good moods and connecting happily with strangers to help take pictures or simply  to wish a Merry Christmas! That made me so happy to witness these joyful moments. 😊

They do such a nice job of making everything so festive, with the lights, music, people working event, and even the concessions are festive and fun. A little pricey for a family, but what isn't these days. I would go again, it's a fun time.

The beermaster tour was well worth it! Plenty of free beer during the tour, and you get to walk through more areas than on the Bud Light tour, such as the canning/bottling floor and your own private tasting  room. Monique was the best tour guide, she really knows her stuff and just loves talking to people! The brewery is very nice and clean, with lots of great things to offer.
So much fun and learned a lot about other beers Bud makes! And you get lots of free beer! Highly recommend

name: Hampton Beach State Park
reviews: I loved Hampton beach!   Periodically throughout the length of the beach there are fresh water showers to get the salt off you and public changing rooms and rest rooms. If you are into shopping or a foodie, you will not be disappointed by their shops along the strip on the land side of the beach.

I wish I could give this beach six stars. We went on a beautiful afternoon on Christmas Day with our family. I cautioned everyone to use the bathroom before we went, assuming everything would be closed. Imagine my surprise when we found the bathroom to be open - with heat to boot. Good job, Hampton council.

The beach as ever was lovely. Clean, well maintained and plenty of parking. We had a great day out.

Great public and state park beach areas.  Good for quiet beach access ( state park ) or more busy beach access with food and fun stuff to do.  Amusements are a bit cheesy but still fun if you want to step away from the beach for a while.

We enjoy Hampton Beach because of everything it is.  Great beach, boardwalk, the strip, entertainment, many restaurants, great place for the family vacation and/or adults. We've been going for years and will continue.
One of the nicest beaches in New England.  Wonderful sandy beach and expansive view of the ocean.  Dunes add character and charm.

name: Red Blazer Restaurant & Pub
reviews: Quality food prepared with care. Never had a bad meal or experience. The staff is friendly and accommodating. The owners are there and there is a good chance you will meet or see one of them during your visit. Not an absentee ownership group. More beers on tap than anywhere in concord! I suggest eating your meal in the pub and enjoy a sporting event on one of their many TVs.

Great Buffet for breakfast. Fresh Fruit, Pastries. Scrambled Eggs, Egg Lasagna, Eggs Benedict, Bacon, Sausage. Home fries, French Toast, hash.  Omelette station, Crepe station, Waffles and Pancakes. Loved my visit.
Great job with Easter dinner take out!  The food was fantastic and we will be back.  Grateful to have The Red Blazer in our community.

The setting is very beautiful and the assistants were friendly. You can to dine in the pub area or a more relaxing dinner setting environment.  Good food at a great price. We will be stopping by again for sure.
Crispy duck with cranberry relish

name: Tucker's
reviews: I don’t say this lightly, but this is literally one of the, if not the, best breakfast restaurants that I know of.    And, I do not mean just in Concord or even in NH but anywhere in the country.  You have to put up with a crowd and it is a small place, but they consistently deliver amazing food and friendly service.  Variety of menu choices and never had a bad thing.  Quaint atmosphere.  Coffee while you wait.  This is THE place to go.  For the record, I like other locations I have visited but Concord is far and away the best.

First visit was pretty good. Place is clean and fresh looking.  Food was tasty but plate's arrived cold. Our waitress was the reason this review got a 4 instead of a 5. I watched the waitress across from us making sure her customers were well taken care of while I couldn't find my waitress if I had GPS. May try it once more because of the food but will ask for a different waitress.

This place is well worth the wait. Friendly staff, quick service, and the food: excellent! Fresh ingredients, healthy options, and all your standard breakfast options. Impossible to leave still hungry as the portions are large. We’ve been twice in the last week. Our new favorite place in NH

Was a bit of wait to be seated but since our party was large I didn't mind. Food was tasty and you get a lot for what you paid. Very good deal. Server was nice, our only complaint is they never bothered to refill our drinks unless we called them over. Probably will come again!

We were driving through Concord and I saw several positive reviews for Tuckers & we lucked out that they weren't on a wait until after we sat down! I recomend the French toast sampler (on the seasonal menu)...it was a great option to try all 3 types which were all so good!

Friendly service from Natasha, nice atmosphere, great menu. We want to come back to try more!

name: Beefside
reviews: Huge portions of very tasty food. The onion rings are incredible! Light, fluffy and buttery. My Black Russian was overstuffed with meat. The scallops are large and juicy and are filled with scallopy goodness. There's usually a wait to get seated so be prepared and come a bit early.
Their food is so good and very consistent while also not being freezer food. You know you're getting good stuff when you go there. My family has been getting food there for decades. Highly recommend.

We were passing by Concord and pulled off the highway to eat dinner.  We happened upon "Still Beefside" (I guess they changed the name with the recent new ownership) and were very pleased with our meal. The service was good, and the food was tasty.  This place is dated and not fancy in any way, but the food and prices are good.  We would eat here if we're in the area again.

Got my Husband hooked! Used to eat there all the time when I was with a Motorcycle Racer who's sponsor was a Freedom Cycles Mechanic. YUMMY Been around a long time which speaks volumes about the food!

If you are looking for a "North Shore Famous Roast Beef 3-way" you wont find it here. They say their sandwiches are famous. Perhaps for the locals in NH. I went here in search for the beef that you truly can only find down in Mass. Beefside proved this to be true in so many ways. Roast beef 3 way is pictured. Yellow cheese? not on the bottom? No onion roll? Sauce where? Mayo where? Beef sliced thick? NOT rare?!!. UGH!!! My belly was sad to eat this. My search continues for a place in NH that can do this beef lover right!

name: Moritomo Japanese Steakhouse & Sushi Bar
address: 32 Fort Eddy Rd, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews:
Stopped in for lunch and I just love this place! 
The sushi chef is super friendly and very knowledgeable. The fish is very fresh, especially on Fridays. Probably the best scallop sushi I have ever had. Their mochi is served at the perfect temperature so that it is neither too firm or too chewy. The service is nice and they also have small private rooms.

This hole in the wall Japanese restaurant and bar is so quaint and surprised me with how flavorful their tempura sauce was, how neatly packed their sushi was, and how beautifully their mixed drinks were served. There was a particular patron that diluted the experience by talking very loudly at the bar. Also, Moritomo would do well to clean their from sign or get a new one.
Decent food. Hibachi was full and sushi was fresh. Drinks and service had room for improvement but they were not rude, just overstaffed. All in all good food. Good atmosphere. Certainly worth a look

We are regulars here. The sushi is always excellent. The crunch spicy scallop roll is out of this world. If you like more spice try the Alvin roll. The hibachi is always fun as well. Our kids love it just as much.
A HUGE selection of food, authentic, great seasonal selections. They have some nice isolated rooms where you can kneel and enjoy your meals as well. Everyone's SUPER nice. Highly recommend.

name: Revival Kitchen and Bar
reviews: I celebrated my PhD yesterday in this great place. I am glad to say that we passed a awesome evening and the restaurant was absolutely one of the reasons for the strong evening. The crew  contributed in a sweet manner, the meals were great and my friends were so  happy. We shall absolutely visit again for more joyful events. Thank you very much.

Amazing hidden gem. Scallops were made to perfection. The catch of the day was Monk fish which was amazing. We finished with peach and blueberry crumble which was great, but the best was strawberry foam. It is served in a little glass jar, and is to die for. Google lists the place as $$$, but I found it almost underpriced.

Fantastic staff, great selection of drinks. Laid back atmosphere but high end at the same time. The other best part is the food! Out of this world. And specials that will leave you wanting to come back for more. Just amazing.

Great food with a modern atmosphere. I had the butternut squash risotto which was wonderfully filling and tastefully plated with a small arugula goat cheese salad. For dessert my date and I both had the Mexican chocolate creme brulee, which was delightfully chocolatey with a barely-there kick that was poetically appropriate for a dessert. I'll definitely go back again soon.

have been here several times - each time I was consistently very happy with the service, gorgeous presentation of food, and overall taste and experience. the food and drinks here are rich, in the best way. this is a special place that I enjoy bringing guests to, and everybody is always super impressed and satisfied when we leave :)

name: Granite Restaurant & Bar
reviews: Lovely meal with fantastic service. This was our first time here, and we were pleasantly surprised. We came because our other favorite restaurants had long waits on a Saturday at lunch. There was abundant parking and we were seated immediately. We had the apple parsnip soup with crab cake BLT, and clam chowder with Caesar salad and salmon. Everything was fresh. The soup was hot and delicious. The crab cake was so fresh. We will be here again. Thanks Granite.

Wow! My husband and I are foodies and love to travel and try new places. We loved this place! The food is delicious & presented beautifully. The staff are all knowledgeable and wonderful. We will definitely be dining again soon!

The food & portion sizes were on point though certainly expensive. I enjoyed a filet & the seasoning on the cut of meat was excellent. The lamb was also extremely tasty.The customer service was good. I found the atmosphere to be a bit "lacking" .... especially considering the location, it just seemed a bit generic or lacking in character.

Overall good food and experience for a special night. Mozzarella app was great as well as spirits. Wife got the scallops which were large with a side of veggies...very good. I ordered the full filet medium rare, it came out medium well if not well. Mashed potatoes were loaded with salt, and this is coming from a salt guy. I'm not one to send food back to the kitchen as I work in the industry during summer months. Would definitely recommend and would go back.
This is like a hidden gem. Great food, very good service and nice atmosphere (a few days it has live music). Highly recommended in Concord.

name: Angelina's Ristorante Italiano
reviews: I'm jealous of all the people who apparently had a great experience here. We had a waitress with glasses and gray hair who was not pleasant. She was clearly stressed out and not managing her tables well. When we asked for recommendations, we were simply told that everything was good. The dishes were filthy. The tablecloth was stained. We were given cold bread. We waited an hour and fifteen minutes for an appetizer while the table who arrived after us (party of two as well) were finishing their dessert. The soup was cold and bland. Our waitress not once apologized for the wait nor acknowledged us while we waited for the appetizer. A waitress from a different section (young, dark hair, hoop blue earrings) noticed that we were being ignored and checked on us. She was the only good thing about our meal and she wasn't our waitress. Then it took another 30 minutes for dinner and it was not worth the price. The risotto was crunchy. More dirty silverware. First time and last time.
The food is amazing! The scallops almost melted in my mouth. The sauce might be one of the best I've ever had, it matched the pasta beautifully. I would highly recommend going!

This site is my number one restaurant.  Of all restaurants I know I like it most. I never miss an opportunity to go to this restaurant. when  I I need a decent dinner, this is the place that comes immediately to my head. extremely good and many types of  food and a large menu.trained team, and agreeable atmosphere. And very important, the pay is modest. I suggest this restaurant with great pleasure.

Angelina's is the best Italian restaurant north of Boston. The food is excellent, so difficult to choose from the luncheons/dinners on the menu  the waitstaff is professional,  attentive, accommodating, wine selection cannot be beat, and try to decide what you'd like for desserts (all made on premise), so yummy. If I could, I'd give it 10 stars. Thank you to the wonderful chef and the employees who help to make it our "go to" restaurant.
Food and atmosphere were splendid, as usual.  Only downside was the server seemed in a hurry to get us out the door even though we had a reservation and we'ed been there less than an hour.

name: Margaritas Mexican Restaurant
reviews: Had a great time, our waitress Stephani was amazing! Her sense of humor really was on point and she made sure everything was just right. The blood orange margarita was very good as was the "Mexican flag". If you are looking for good Mexican food in a lively atmosphere I'd recommend coming here!

1st time wandering through streets of Concord NH on our road trip today. Stopped in to celebrate National Margarita day. I would recommend the Black Cherry margarita for sure!  We had a great time having lunch in the old jail cell. Our waitress Stephanie was wonderful, sharing stories of the area (we asked a lot of questions!). We’ll be back for the patio season no doubt!

In today's world with a ton of food and drink options, it's the wait staff that truly makes the dining experience. Our server Steph was amazing! Friendly, helpful, and the reason we will definitely be coming back! The food and margaritas were great too. I have long been a Margaritas fan and this was by far my favorite Margaritas experience to date!
Very cool concept, being. The food was decent as well. Not my favorite Mexican place near here, but a very cool place to take guests. Our kids loved the novelty of the jail cells. ☺️

We have been going to this restaurant for many years. Over the years we have celebrated many birthdays and other occasions. The atmosphere is perfect for a celebration of many or just two. The staff has always done there best to make our time with them great. We have enjoyed numerous menu items and drinks. Of course we love their salsa.

name: Ichiban Japanese Steakhouse & Sushi Bar
reviews:
Very good restaurant. Enjoyed the hibachi with family and friends many times.
It can get a bit hectic when the hibachi tables are busy. Seating in the restaurant is a little more laid back.
The sushi assortment and specialties are tasty. Try the Golden Roll.
The cooks at the hibachi are very skilled and put on a good show.

I celebrated my nomination earlier this evening in this gorgeous place. Well it was a fantastic evening and the venue was unquestionably one of the reasons for this outstanding meeting. The waiters  contributed in a pleasant style, the cooking was tasty and my friends were very  happy. We shall definitely return for more joyful events. thanks very much.
We sat in the hibachi section. Very entertaining. Food was fresh, portions were ample, not too spicy. Kid friendly.
We love the hibachi. It is fun and the food is delicious! (Review written by my 8 year old :D )
Hard to pick from the extensive menu. Service is good, not great. Food is reasonably priced. Easy location to find. On a very busy road so be careful entering and exiting.

name: The Common Man Restaurant
address: 25 Water Street Use 1 Gulf Street for GPS, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Really hearty meal. All food was very tasty. I would recommend the Chowder, the Nantucket pie and the Pot Roast. Also the staff was very friendly and welcoming. Definitely worth visiting.

Great service and a cool atmosphere. Downstairs there are old comics, Life Magazines, and local products for sale as well. Food was great and nicely plated! Great selection of domestic and local beer. Scallops were cooked perfectly! Veggies were a bit well done, but I overlooked that...because the scallops were PERFECT! Crab cake was also amazing and cooked perfectly.

Food was delicious. BF had the pot roast which was really good. Broccoli cooked just right. Not mushy, not hard. The only thing I didn't care for was the no personality young man that greeted us. I tried to engage him but got nothing back. But I'd definitely go back.

Best service for take out.  Prime Rib and Mac And cheese we called in for take out and we got a full meal with dessert.  Food was great, service was beyond good.  Best dinner ever 
Thank you To all employees at Common Man.

A great restaurant. The food was very delicious, the salmon salad, the burgers and the cake were all well made and special. The design of the place was nice and catchy. On top of that THE SERVICE; from the moment you walk in you will be greeted with smiling waitresses, and the service at our table was superb. Arial with her lovely laughter and positive energy added to the experience a great value. A place that I would go back to for sure. Well done everyone

name: O Steaks & Seafood
address: 11 S Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: I celebrated my birthday yesterday in this gorgeous place. Well we enjoyed a delightful evening and the place was no doubt one of the reasons for this strong evening. The crew  contributed in a graceful way, the cuisine was yummy and my buddies were so  glad. We shall absolutely return for more events. Thank you very much.

While traveling for work I came across O Steaks & Seafood. The service is great.  This place is really clean.  I had the salmon which was cooked perfectly. I sat at the bar but the dining area was equally impressive as well as the outside seating. I wish I would have found this place on first night here instead of my last.  Hoping I have to come back this way soon just so I can come back again! If you are wondering if you should go here.... please DO!!!

So let me start by saying "WOW!! AMAZING!!!" This place has some of the best food around!! A but more expensive than most places but the extra money spent is well worth it!!! This place will not disappoint all the way from the decor to dessert. Great service! Amazing food!! A place you will love and will always want to come back for more! Enjoy!!
If I could give the O pops a 10 star rating I would. But in all honesty... I have been here quite a few times and everything I've had here has been perfect. Highly Recommend.

Only our second time there but the food was delicious... My recommendation is to go for lunch based on the menu prices. You still get most of the same dishes with a decent amount of food but alot cheaper. You also don't have to wait for a table and the service was great! Try them out if you're in the area, you will not be disappointed...

name: El Rodeo Mexican Restaurant
reviews: Ate every last bite because it was so good! I would have given it 5 stars but we waited at the table forever before we were asked about our drink order. By that time we had scoured their elaborate menu and were ready to order! Food was great.
I love the guacamole here.  The service was a little slow in the beginning today but they were very busy.  I highly recommend the Cadillac margarita!
Great food. Fantastic drinks. A level 7 margarita with some reposado is fantastic. Highly recommend. I'm never disappointed here!
My experience here have always been great. Margaritas here are awesome ! And never disappointed with their food so far. Good for both Lunch and Dinner. Will be back soon.

Best Mexican food in the capital region by far. Always fresh ingredients and perfect portions.  Staff is attentive and friendly. Prices are moderate but a good value for the quality of the food served.

name: Sunshine Oriental Restaurant
reviews: I celebrated my birthday yesterday in this delicious restaurant. I am glad to say that we passed a cool evening and the restaurant was surely the reason for this happy celebration. The crew  contributed in a gorgeous style, the food was appetizing and my buddies were extremely  happy. We shall surely come back again for more events. Thank you very much.
Really chinese in a long time. 3X BETTER THAN DC area. Soup was good.

You must try this place. Excellent food and service. Owners are very friendly.
Try the dinner combo plates...perfect foods!
PuPu platter is a great choice as well.
Hot tea is always flavorful and the Hot & Sour soup is one of the best I have had.

Was recommended this place by someone local. I have to say Tina is very nice and the food was absolutely amazing! If I stay in this town this will be my go to place she helped me find something new! So if you don’t know what you want Tina wi help you! Those shrimp dumplings where amazing!
Owners are so nice. Tina remembers every customer's name! The food and dim sum are great. This is the only Chinese food place we go to.

name: Constantly Pizza
address: 39 S Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: I cannot express how much I love Constantly Pizza. I live in Epsom but will gladly make the hike to downtown Concord to get a slice (okayyy, maybe a whole pizza). The service is good and the pizza is even better. The cherry on top: their store smells like heaven.

Constantly Pizza has probably been my favorite pizza restaurant in Concord so far. The sauce and cheese have simple flavors that allow the other toppings to speak for themselves. It isn't  greasy, I mean, some grease, but not a lot. The healthy amount of grease for pizza.

My 8" sub was also a ton of food, and it nearly made me explode eating it all. I almost thought I wasn't going to be able to eat the chocolate dipped cannoli. Almost.

But I powered through, and that cannoli was amazing. 10/10 on the dessert. Overall, I am happy with my trip here! 8/10
Ordered "well done" chicken wings. Three of them were uncooked and had to be thrown away. The pizza was good, but we now know where NOT to go for chicken wings.

Awesome lunch deal the day I went. 3 slices and a drink for under 6 bucks! The slices are thinner than your average slice but was excellent for trying different toppings. The plain cheese was bomb dot com.

Great pizza and subs and a great crew running the place.  We order here for work functions quite often and we can always depend on timely delivery with the correct order.  Pizza is some of the best in concord,  well worth a try.

name: Siam Orchid Thai Bistro
address: 12 N Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: We arrived at this restaurant for dinner. This spot was recommended to us by a friend.  Well, it was a winning. The staff welcomed us with a smile and we felt good. The food was just great. We enjoyed every moment and we will definitely return to this restaurant. Highly recommended.

Great little cozy spot. My dad and I got pad Thai, the crispy chicken was particularly good. They had a little tray of spices that really kicked things up a notch. Friendly staff and nice interior design. Also a giant menu so even the oldest of people can read it, a nice touch.
I love the Thai food here. It is the best I have had in NH. Cute little location as well. Their coconut soup is wonderful. I also recommend the seafood dynamite. The staff is friendly.

I eat a lot of meals at Concord restaurants.  Siam Orchid ranks as one of my favorites!  They have a wide variety of Thai food.  The staff is very friendly, the food comes up promptly, and the flavors and portions are always very good!
Delicious food! Got the pineapple fried rice and the mango curry, and both were really fantastic, not too spicy at all which was nice. Looking forward to the leftovers tomorrow!

name: Cheers Grille & Bar
reviews:
Everyone at our table enjoyed most of their food.  Not sure why I could not have a cup of soup instead of one of the listed sides.  I was willing to pay an upcharge.  I had to buy a cup of soup and my husband took the fruit cup side ... which was not sweet at all.  My husband ordered tea and it did not taste right.  He had to pay extra to get his drink switched to soda.  Again, most of the food was really good but the small things that were not right made the dining experience annoying.
UPDATE:  Made a return visit.  It was our server's first day at work ... she was GREAT!  I tried out the fried fish and it was EXCELLENT!  Today's visit was a solid five stars.
Very good food, great menu with lots to choose from, great cocktails and family friendly. Waitstaff is attentive and friendly. You will not be disappointed.

Food was pretty good overall. Steak was slightly overcooked but looked and tasted very flavorful. Had a stuffed haddock dish that I sent back because it was still cold in the middle but they were very nice and understanding. We will definitely go back again sometime. It's a cozy worn in place but still fun for date night.

This place is always a top notch !
The entire menu is good.
Try the adult Mac n' Cheese ...YUM
Patty Melt is the best around!

Cool atmosphere. Food was very good. Ser or was super friendly but was responsible for the whole outdoor area so it took her a while to get to us. Overall a very good experience and very good food. Would recommend if in the area.

name: LongHorn Steakhouse - Curbside To Go Available
reviews: Busy place.  One of the best flavored steaks I have had in ages.  The steak was preceded by a nice loaf of bread.  Staff was courteous and entertaining.  We had a guest with a lot of food allergies.  They went the extra mile to ensure the individual was properly treated and served.

Most of the food was very good, but I think the prices were quite high. For example, we paid $22.49 for four small grilled lamb chops. A bit more reasonable was the LongHorn Steak Tips (12oz.) for $15.99. All totaled we paid $69.72 (not including the tip) for 3 entres and one iced tea. 
I chose the "Loaded Idaho Baked Potato" as my side dish. It wasn't as "loaded" as I expected and a bit dry. I had to ask for more sour cream to make it work for me. The service was good, but not exceptional. The atmosphere was pleasant, especially if you like a cowboy ranch theme. Next time I would choose to go to an all you can eat buffet for $20 less.

They treat you well with bread at the table and great service. I had a bone in rib eye and they come just short of the fifth star due to a chewy steak. I ordered medium rare and they nailed that target. Why was it tough? - I don't know - maybe we're looking at the quality of the cut of meat. Our friend had prime rib and he was in heaven.
Always a good meal here. Usually very tasty cuts of meat. Service is on the ball! Great portions and presentation.

I love the food at Longhorn. Good steaks at reasonable prices. I like it way better than Texas Roadhouse which is so noisy and obnoxious. Longhorn is geared more towards a nice dinner for family or friends. I only wish they had more vegetable sides, most of the sides are potatoes.

name: Vibes Gourmet Burgers
address: 25 S Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Delicious burgers with interesting options for toppings. The poutine fries were okay, better the first time we went over a year ago.

Honestly one of the best burgers I've had!! As my son put it, "my stomach was jealous my mouth got it first!"  The burger was cooked to perfection, with the perfect amount of seasoning and juicy but not greasy.  If you haven't eaten at this establishment it's a definite must!  This place has it all great food and an awesome staff.

I want to start off by saying that that we got there at opening so keep that In mind. So we walk in and they hand us menus to look over quickly before we order like five guys style but supposedly nicer but within two minutes of getting there one of the employees discovers the fridge was at something like 68 degrees and all the chicken products were spoiled. We are not too disappointed because we wanted burgers so we order anyway. Are burgers arrive relatively quickly. I ordered my burger medium(what I always get) and I bite into and am eating and it’s cooked pretty well but about halfway through I realize it’s cold. Pretty disappointed!

Great little place for hand cooked fresh burgers and a small selection of local craft beers. After you eat here, you can to to the other side for some gelato! The service here isn't fast - so don't expect speeds like the fast food burger chains. The environment is nice and relaxed, no need to dress up here. Parking is available in the front on the road, or on the parking garage in the rear (accessed from another road).

Great burger/sandwich place with local meats and tasty sauces. Their unusual burger lives up to it's name and they have made fresh veggie burgers as well. Their poutine is delicious and they usually have a pretty good tap selection. Try their milkshakes as well, or pop next door for a Sunday after your burger!

name: The Newell Post
reviews:
This place never disappoints.
Breakfast is especially good.
Try the Sausage Biscuit and Gravy and the Tortouire Meat Pie in an omelette...YUM.
Oh yeah great desserts.
Do not miss this place. Very busy on the weekend morning's but we'll worth the wait!
Amazing place!! The corned beef hash is homemade along with the bread! Crabcake and the meat pie were delicious!
Always excellent food-home made bread and pastries as well as other delicious breakfast plates. Prices are good and the service is great! You won't be disappointed!

First of all, I'm a Southerner and we kind of dominate the realm of breakfast, and I was surprised to see some very southern dishes on the menu. I was told the restaurant was very good, and it's true. They must have some Southern boys in the back! I've had country fried steak that wasn't half as good as what I got here. I was very pleasantly surprised. The grits were decent! The corned beef hash is absolutely AWESOME and made old school. This is a really good restaurant for simple American breakfast and brunch food, and perhaps a great reminder of home for any Southerners in the area.

I have tried this place several times (sporadically) hoping that it might get better. I think today was my last visit for breakfast. My mother had an omelette that was unable to be eaten due to the eggs being very undercooked. My son and I both ordered the Hash Benedict. The hash was not hash, it was a bunch of shredded, dry and very overcooked corned beef and 4, yes 4 tiny chunks of potato. I would rather have eaten canned hash. Our server, Briar, was really great about it. It isn't her fault after all, she didn't cook it. Briar took the omelette off of the check and took 50% off of mine.

name: Dos Amigos Burritos
address: 26 N Main St #4912, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Easy 5 stars!  I've been craving tacos like I've had visiting Texas... And this hit the spot!  Easy one of the best fish tacos and definitely the best chips and guac I've ever had!

Dos Amigos was a cute little spot. I decided on the burrito. I substituted the black beans for refried pinto beans. The chicken was good. They add a twist with coleslaw on the burrito. I personally feel that there was too many flavors on the burrito to taste just one or two. The sauce was somewhat sweet. Not expected. May dine again due to convenience and speed of order.

Nice to have a local burrito shop with friendly staff and consistently great food. 

Vegan options. Beer. Great view of Main St.
Everyone was so friendly and the food was delicious! We had a few food substitution requests and they were so accommodating. Food came out fast and everyone loved what they got.
Delicious, reasonably priced food, in a casual atmosphere. Great vibes with beautiful artwork for sale by local artists. Next time in Concord, I'll visit again.

name: Makris Lobster & Steak House
address: 354 Sheep Davis Rd, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Why does it seem like every Seafood restaurant that exists in the state of New Hampshire seems to not know how to make real New England style Tarter sauce. Seriously you would think that any New England Seafood restaurant that wants to be well respected would at least get their Tarter sauce right, but NO, not in New Hampshire. Anyway, honestly, even mixing sweet gherkins relish with mayo, would make a better Tarter sauce than "Makris" awful, bitter, nasty tasting Tarter sauce, yuck! Oh' and I know some of you might say, why make such a big deal about Tarter sauce, cause without providing a good tasting Tarter sauce, you simply will ruin the rest of ones meal. Yeah, things like... Sweet Whole Belly Fried Clams will taste awful, if the Tarter sauce is terrible, and in this case that is what we exactly experienced!!!

It was a last minute decision to stop by on the way to the lake. From the outside it’s looks nice and with all the bikes outside you might think it’s just a biker bar but when you enter the restaurant it is quite large. 

The decor is a bit campy but clean, nothing fancy. The servers were very nice and helpful and my lobster was fantastic. Of course it’s  kinda hard to screw that up:). Toni had steak tips which were cook exactly as she ordered them and the quality of the meat was very good. 

I don’t think there’s any question the quality of the food is excellent and I saw the owner walking around constantly, which is always reassuring.  He appears to run a tight ship. 

The bar was packed on an early Friday evening.  Live band setting up so they have a good bar following.  Looks like a favorite place for bikers traveling 106. 

Definitely worth a try.

Lobster roll was okay, crab cake was excellent, scallops were well done and the smelts were a bit overfried. The fries however, amazing. Crispy and lightly salted. Service was good. Decent meal with reasonable price.

I enjoyed this restaurant. I got the fried native shrimp and native clams half and half dinner. The native clams were market price for $10 a half.

Overall it was pretty good. We had a big party and they were easily able to sit us inside. I have been previously as well and sat on the deck. The deck has its own bar which is cool.

It can get really busy around race weekends with Louden being so close, so be prepared for that. Also your GPS may bring you to some back road to get there and you won't be able to actually pull into the restaurant parking lot. You'll have to go back to route 9 and then head north on 109.

The ribeye steak I had was great and the price is very reasonable. My only complaint is that I wanted prime rib, which I was going to have rare/ medium rare, but was told it was already all cooked at medium. It was disappointing because you can always cook it longer by request, but once it is cooked you can’t go back.

name: CC Tomatoes
reviews: This is our local go to dinner place. They have friendly staff and a comfortable atmosphere. Good selection of options and the food is always good. Very reasonablely priced as well. Overall absolute great dinner spot.

Absolutely fantastic food! My mom and I happened to stop in here and we are both chefs, absolutely amazing food! Cozy atmosphere and waiter was nice and outgoing! Highly recommend! We had the soup special which was the beefy potato corn chowder and it was outstanding, we were raving about it!
The menu and service were ahead of my expectations. We really liked the vibes of this place. Excellent place to take the family out for dinner.

I can't say enough good things about this place. Service was great. Our waitress, I believe it was Katija, was excellent. We placed our drinks and apps which came out in no time. The calamari and mozz fritters were awesome. The best calamari I had in a long time. Perfectly cooked. I had the prime rib which was cooked perfectly. Tender, juicy, and great flavor. Definitely come back again.

We will be going back. This was our first visit, and it was so difficult to select a meal. Incredible reasonable prices. Friendly from the moment you walk in, until you leave. It is like you were family. I had the chicken pesto panini. I like a bit more punch to the flavor in my food, but overall it was all good food. Next time, and there will be a next time, I will add a bit of sauce. Soup/salad and sandwich for under $10!!

name: The Windmill Restaurant Inc.
reviews: It's been years since I've been there for a meal! It was fantastic! The customer service was pleasant, the food came super fast, large portion size, and was served hot. The atmosphere of the restaurant was family-like, peaceful with conversations happening at each table but you could still communicate at your table without speaking over all the other conversations. I would recommend this restaurant and I will return myself.

Family environment. You feel it as soon as you enter the door. Whether it is your first visit or you go there regularly, you are greeted as if you you are coming back. With that said, just relax. You can enter from either side of the restaurant, they will keep track of who came in when. There can be a wait during normal dining times.

The food is good, home style cooking, no matter what meal you order. The prices are very reasonable. The staff here is a mixture of your brother who handles everything but you might need to ask twice; mother who will ask you three times if you have everything; sister who rather be some where else but will be fast, attentive, and takes the time to dialogue with you; and the aunt who knows everything that is going on even if you are not her table, she has what you need covered.

Used to come here when I was a kid with my grandparents. Always loved it. Now as an adult I have been back to new Hampshire for vacation and this place was on my list. Everything I ordered here was delicious, the service was quick, attentive and friendly and the food came fast! They're always busy but it didnt effect any of the servers or cooks. Would recommend!
We love getting breakfast at The Windmill! Their staff is friendly and prompt and the food is home-cooked goodness! They are accommodating for small children and have plenty of parking.

Really like the Windmill! I’ve been a lot. I’ve had a few eh experiences but they almost always fix something if it is wrong! The food is inexpensive and super yummy, exactly what you’d expect for breakfast food. Love the homefries. All about em.

name: Whiskey & Wine
address: 148 N Main St #4917, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: The ramen was great. Loved the roasted cauliflower.  Our waitress was attentive. The gal bartending need to turn down the volume.  Her voice was too loud.

We stopped here on our way up to the mountains. We had their lunch special, choose a lunch size ramen and choose a bao sandwich for just $12. Very cool atmosphere and both the waitress and the chef were super nice. We will definitely be back soon! Worth the 45 minute drive for us.
Always great food here, I’m always surprised they aren’t busier. Maybe it’s the location. But never a bad meal! Homemade food, small plates and ramen are amazing. Drinks are always delicious.
Really nice vibe. great drink list and very interesting food choices. But it would be nice if there were more options with large portions. Your best off ordering two things off the menu.
Delicious cocktails. Convenient location downtown. High recommend for a relaxed evening out.

name: Puppy Love Hot Dog
address: 50 N Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: The food was excellent! Very fresh and lots of choices of toppings for the dogs.  Best deal in town.  Family owned so we were happy to be eating local :)

If you're looking for a great lunch great staff the owner as an awesome person the food is delicious reasonably priced this is a place to go support your local business and if you're a tourist this is a spot to go for some good old-fashioned American food yummy yummy

If your in Concord and are craving a good hot dog try Puppy Love Hot Dog right in the middle of downtown. It's the hole in the wall pervayor with that little extra something I like to call heart. The dogs are delicious, and the service is always with a smile. I've enjoyed these hot dogs for years and years. You should definitely make a point of trying them out. There's lots of great toppings I recommend a chili cheese dog.
Good dogs.
Excellent service, great dogs

name: Gas Lighter Restaurant
address: 204 N Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Stopped here after hot yoga in Concord.  Lots of Greek food choices; l chose lemon chicken soup and their stuffed cabbage Greek style with a salad on the side.  Pretty tasty!  (Ground pork, rice and diced pepperoncinis in the cabbage.) The place filled up as it was lunch time.
Beer served in frozen mugs. What more can you ask for!? Awesome bar!
Delicious food!!! Very friendly people; both staff and other regulars. Everything made on premise. One of the oldest restaurants in Concord. I will be back next time I dm in town!
Always a pleasure.....Beef Stew was sublime.
Food and drinks were perfectly as expected! Great job!

name: Willows Plant-Based Eatery
address: 55 S Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: The homemade blueberry lemonade was everything! The food was very good with cute catchy names for the dishes
My first time there and it will not be my last super good I loved the salad and the broth of the soup
Absolutely delicious and EVERYTHING IS ORGANIC!!! Great service and ambience. This is my new go-to restaurant in Concord.
Only good option in the area for vegan/vegetarian. Kind of bland in flavor, but still ok.

I had the half moon sandwich and it was INCREDIBLE. I don’t now how that was vegan. The food came quickly and a dog kept me company while I waited. What more could I ask for? I can’t wait to go back for more.

name: Veano's Italian Kitchen 2
reviews: Eggplant parm and French onion soup were delicious!! Great portions. Highly recommend. Thank you for delivering!!

Marinara sauce WAY too sweet, should have stayed home and had Newman’s jar sauce. Reminded me of Greek cuisine. Salad was poor and service was too. On a positive note, premises was very clean. Haven’t been to a Veano’s in many years, now I remember why.
Amazed at so many good ratings, we dine out often and know fine dining, this isn’t it.

The customer service was great! The homemade italian food my boyfriend loved the lasagna. The potato skins was huge and good. Mozzarella sticks were good. Chicken wings and strips were yummy! The pizza was delicious! I wish I could have tried more. Great service and food! What more could you ask for
Best breakfast in town! Steak and eggs were top notch. Friendly and efficient staff are the best. Family owned and operated, they do a great job and the atmosphere is perfect. 5 stars!
Great service and the best hollandaise sauce I've ever had!!

name: Primetime Wellness Club
reviews: I'm just one of their drivers that delivers some of their ingredients and they are some of my nicest customers I have, they always greet me with a smile and sometimes a delicious drink! Haven't tried much else besides the tea but it is one of the best teas that I've had and definitely helps with the morning kick I need! 10/10 Would recommend! Super nice, and great drinks!
Great heathy shakes, amazing atmosphere!

Great place! I love the huge menu of shakes! Best way to start the day with a Shake and the energizing tea! I gotta have the raspberry tea and cinnamon roll shake! Everyone is always so pleasant! You should check it out!

The best shakes around... and healthy!!! I also can’t get enough of the energizing tea. So many flavor options for both shake and teas. The best part though is the smiles and personal connections you get as soon as you walk in!

The incredible atmosphere and amazing coaches compliment the delicious + nutritious shakes they serve!! The extensive menu has something for EVERYBODY, and the energizing teas will completely make your day!! Open 7 days, too!! You should definitely stop in :)

name: Newicks Lobster House
reviews: Part of my rating is because it seems to me the restaurant wants to portray itself as a higher end type place and not sure it stands up that well if that is the comparison.  Food was good.  Especially enjoyed the lobster pie.  Service was friendly but a bit slow.  I found the restaurant itself to feel dreary on the inside and in need of refurbishment. All in all, not a bad experience and I may go back, but I also am not going to be rushing back.

We arrived 30 minutes before close and were the last customers there. Despite this fact they still took their time to answer all of our stupid questions about their menu and amazing variety of seafood dishes.

The food was amazing and our server was very knowledgeable about the menu. Highly recommended.

The picture is of my baked  seafood stuffed haddock and  a lobster that was added on for only $10. Loved it.

My wife had the twin lobster,  which was pretty good (how can you really go wrong) she said the taste had a funniness ( maybe from the water in the tank). I got sea scallops, 5 oz for 18.99, which would have been fine,  but they were bay scallop sized (maybe 7/8" at most) and overcooked. The coconut shrimp that I got was excellent,  the best thing I had by far. The service was prompt and the waiter attentive and friendly.
Excellent food, service, and prices. Gorgeous decor. Created a wonderful memory with family

Amazing. The waitress was awesome, made sure we were happy more than once. Accommodating to all our needs. Place was clean. Neat. Homey. Love the fact it small business family owned an it bout the customer satisfaction. Price seemed little high for me but food was PERFECTION!!! I love food. Know good food an this place an it employees are awesome.
all in all great. Keep going back no problem.

name: Hermanos
reviews: Very nice people and service, food is delicious! Staff answered my questions and made me a. Fabulous meal!!

Love this place! Excellent food, lots of healthy and vegetarian options. Great for lunch, family friendly. Live music quite often. Highly recommended, this is our favorite place for Mexican food in NH!!
Fantastic well made food!  Celebrating local food & service with a menu that has just the right dishes to choose from.  The Garlic nachos has been superb for decades!
Stopped in for a quick snack of salsa and guacamole.  Great service!  We had the house margarita which was very fresh!  Guacamole was excellent!  Lots and of great people watching in the parking lot.
Got the Scotts Nachos and a couple margaritas!  Both were Great!

name: The Works Café
address: 42 N Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: I have been here a few times and it always delicious! The sandwiches are always fresh. The ingredients are locally sourced and you can taste it! They have group of young people working there that are top notch! One in particular is Devin, what a helpful and polite young man!! Way to go Devin for showing people young people do work hard!!
Great rustic place with brick walls, cow hide farm fresh vibe. Fabulous fresh foods and great atmosphere in this small Concord Main Street gem. Highly recommended.
Absolutely delicious and fresh! Never disappointed here!
Delicious food, amazing smoothies, and a relaxed environment. Definitely stop here if you're in Concord
The bread quality at this place is really nice. I love their location on main St as well.  Thanks for a great lunch!

name: Tea Garden
address: 184 N Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Alysa loved T.G. always had great service and great food. It was another regular T.G. night accept they forgot my white rice with my order of General Tso's. I was upset at first and called. I asked if they could deliver a white rice order to me. Before I knew it the white rice was at my front door and I was enjoying my mean in its entirety. Thanks Tea Garden  for another great night of food and service

Been coming here since I was born. Always my go-to for comfort food or just a warm meal. Not expensive at all. My favorite meals here are the bean tofu, general Gau, sweet and sour soup, spicy green beans, and spring rolls.
This is my favorite Chinese restaurant in Concord. Always been very happy with our food. We've Been coming here for ten years.   Thank you Yes Garden!

We have ordered take out from Tea Garden for years but this was our first time eating in. The atmosphere is basic, but more comfortable than many Chinese "restaurants" that provide cafeteria style accommodations. We sat in a comfortable booth. The service was prompt and food was very good.
Lunch meal was great and was enough that I have left overs. Hot and sour soup great

name: Sal's Pizza
reviews: I will always recommend Sal's pizza. From the taste to the size it is a great value. Basically a 1/4 pizza you get a choice of slices. Take a friend/ loved one and share a slice of each. Good crust, plenty of toppings. Soda, water and basic desserts.
The meat pizza was great. I can tell the owner chose very selective toppings. Each topping stood out from each other. Great blend.
Kids love this place. Slices are huge and cheap. And, they can pick from any one of a dozen or more different creations. Staff are friendly and typically will remember you from prior visits.

As always I love food more than anything. And Sal's pizza is in the top on my rank. Good food and more important good people always greeting you with a big smile. The prices are good for the huge piece of pizza or for the whole pizza. Keep up the good work

Sal's Pizza was the best pizza joint that I had when I went to Concord. It has a variety of options by the slice, but you can also order wings or whole pizzas if that is what you want. The serving sizes are a little on the large side, but that's exactly what you want when you get a slice of pizza. 

Definitely the pizza place to go in downtown Concord.

name: Man Yee
reviews: This place is surely one of the best place to eat in the neighborhood. Always when I go there I am deeply pleased. They preserve their very high  standard service and the highest level of meals  they serve. You surely will enjoy this this restaurant. Very  recommended.
Been going here for decades. The renovation is nice

We came to this restaurant for lunch. my friend recommended this restaurant.  Well, it was very successful. The crew were extremely nice and we had an excellent feeling. The meal was tasty. We enjoyed every moment and we will visit this place again. Warmly recommended.

Pretty okay, crab rags were yummy, fried rice was pretty good. Orange chicken was not so great. The chicken was very dark, looked like beef. Extremely chewy  kinda rubbery, small portions for a dinner plate.
Delivery came faster than anticipated. And food is amazin!! Lots of crab ragoons and the seafood is delicious with lots of veggies!! I would have liked to have orderd sushi but thats a minor thing

name: Olive Garden Italian Restaurant
reviews: Always a great experience here. The staff has always been friendly and attentive but not overly so. Last night, we had Bree (not 100% on the spelling) as our server and I have to give her a shout out. She is absolutely amazing. She explained that she was new, but we would never have known. She made sure we had everything we needed at all times. The restaurant was busy but she did not show any indication of being overwhelmed or frazzled. Everything was just great! Super grateful, impressed, and appreciative.

I know. How can Olive Garden get 5 stars? It's a chain, they're everywhere, and often not as grand as local farm to table establishments. Well they at least appear to have their stuff together at this location. Plenty of seating, wasn't greeted immediately but was seated quickly. But then there was Brandy, the Brandy with all of the kids. What a breath of fresh air. From offering wine samples to giving her honest opinion on her personal faves and giving us substitution ideas for our picks, this woman had it all. What's better? Eric who brought us our food was delightful. Funny and engaging. Truly a wonderful experience. The food with substitution options came out great and we brought desserts home per Brandy's recommendations. I would buy anything from this woman.

We visit this place fairly regularly. I would say 4 times a year. It is always good. Food and service!! Glad they finally put a meat sauce on the menu!! Keep up the good work and I will keep on coming back.

The service from our waitress was really great! I appreciated her helpfulness and humor. The food was good, but the pasta with garlic sauce I got was a little too oily for my taste. The bread sticks were quite salty. The atmosphere was warm and comfortable.

The Olive Garden has always been a favorite of my husband and myself for years.  We love the Concord Olive Garden very much!  We went today.  The food was delicious and the wait staff were sooo great!  They are very kind to us.  We will be back soon.  Thank you for all the hard work you all do to make your restaurant great!!

name: Arnie's Place
reviews: Super fun atmosphere with great service. The French fries are amazing! The staff is very friendly and helpful. I was taking my daughter just to ride the carousel outside and when we ran out of quarters an employee gave a us some more for a few more rides.

Yum, yum, yum. Arnie's has been an institution in Concord, NH for ages. They serve grill food (hot dogs, hamburgers, pulled pork) and an assortment of homemade ice cream. You will find a flavor and size to meet everyone's needs. If you are lactose-intolerant please note that your option may be limited. They even sell Christmas trees during the Holidays.  Definitely worth a visit if you are in Concord. 

Please note: Arnie's does close down for the winter, but reopens in late February/early March.
This place is worth giving a shot. They serve big portions for convenient prices. Regularly neat and with awesome vibes. Will come visit again.
Best burgers in Concord, great staff been going here for many years. The best places to eat are always non corporate!

Old school grill featuring a variety of burgers, hot dogs, and barbecue items.  Delicious!  Side items including fries, onion rings, potato salad and some other items.  They also have delicious ice cream.  Ordering is done at counter.  Indoor seating is fairly limited but plenty of outdoor seating when weather is nice.  Prices are good.  Arnie's is an iconic spot in Concord and definitely well worth it.

name: Splendid Sushi
reviews: Their sushi is delicious!! They are very nice, I called to see what time they were opened till and they said 7PM I looked at the time and it was 7:15pm so I went to say okay thanks. The woman I spoke with said it was okay to order anyway. She even let me call her right back with our order. When we picked up our order it was 8. Good food and good people.

I’m in love with this quaint sushi bar. The atmosphere is relaxing like a day spa. Their food is fresh and always tasty. Did I mention CLEAN! Establishment is very clean and the people who work here are friendly and helpful. I’m so glad we have a Poke Bowl place close to home.
Quality sushi, very reasonable prices—especially during lunch.  Ambience is a bit sleepy, the music sounds more like a massage parlor than a sushi place. But everything else is top notch.
Amazing... the best sushi in town! I like their poke bowl too. And fair prices!

Very friendly and nice people. Family run business.  Great Sushi.  Best in town.  Very clean and welcoming atmosphere. 

A. Gazelle

name: EJ's on Main
address: 172 N Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews:
We love the breakfast here!
Sarah and Evie and Karen all nnow Mom since she comes in almost every Thursday morning. Fresh fruit, carafes of coffee, real butter,  great service and scrumptious food makes EJs the perfect spot for breakfast.  They serve breakfast until 10, so get in there! Today's cinnamon pancakes were awesome!! 🥞🥓🍳☕
Great place for a drink with friends or a family dinner.    Atmosphere and staff is great.  Was very happy with my experience.
Waitress was great, but the kitchen messed up multiple parts of our order and the food was average. Chicken fingers were amazing and the drinks were delicious.
Service is very friendly, food great quality and for some reason it is never over crowded.

I am giving this one star because the food was absolutely terrible. The salmon was a strange color it had an awful taste the vegetables were hard. If it wasn't for the wonderful waiter I wouldn't give this place one star he was excellent, friendly and very attentive to a large crowd that we had. This is truly a restaurant that just caters to people in the hotel that may not have a car and cannot go out. It was very surprising that on a Friday night there was not many people in there at all but that did not surprise us after we ate there would not recommend it. And a word to the waiter go find a place that would appreciate your service, you did an excellent job and you should be in a restaurant that people appreciate not only the good service but good food.

name: 99 Restaurants
reviews: Ordered take out during this “stay at home” time. Service was very good; boneless wings and seafood chowder very good as always! Was anxious to get the hot buttered lobster roll; Lots of meat but did not taste fresh, roll was very soggy (we’re only 5 minutes away) and fries were cold. I was disappointed, especially with the price of it!
Our $9.99 meals of fried shrimp and twin catch were excellent. Bloody Marys to top it off..... excellent choice to accompany Christmas shopping!
I loved my experience coming here! it’s a great place. The food I ordered was really good I would totally recommend this nice little place!
Nice place for a good libation, good food, good conversation. The southwestern chicken bowl was very tasty, the beer was nice and cold, very refreshing. I'll be going back to check more of the menu.
Enjoyed our time, waitress was nice and the food and drinks were great

name: Five Guys
address: 56 Fort Eddy Rd, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Ordering was quick and easy online, order came fairly quick after I got there. Even with all the stuff going on food still came out fairly quick and well made.
Delcious milkshakes and hamburgers. Quick staff, and polite ones at that. The place itself is very affordable, being that its a fast food chain. Great place to satiate your guilty pleasures.
I’ve been going to 5 guys since they have come to Nh. I’m absolutely in love w the company. Burgers are always delicious and the service. I would recommend 5guys concord Nh store any day!
Excellent burgers made fresh with hand cut fries. The only downside is all the noise that the workers make. I had to move to a table further away from the grill.
Best burgers in town, great price, and the french 🍟 you can't beat them they're fresh and a small fry will feed two people easily plus free peanuts,.

name: Red Arrow Diner
reviews: It's always good. It's a traditional American diner, and if you want that kind of food they hit the nail on the head every time, plain and simple. My grandparents love it because it's food they love and my friends love it because it's at an amazing price. Just all around great, simple food with amazing staff who make you feel at home, whether it's your 1st or 51st time there

Wow! 1st time eating here. Menu is massive and I love the fact that you can order anything on it 24 hours a day! Big fan of reuben and chicken fried steak. Also ordered a slice of raspberry almond cake.
Great stop for breakfast lunch or dinner especially if your heading over to the white mountains.
Great Diner Experience!  I’m not a fan of the Manchester location but always pleased with Concord. Clean stimulating diner atmosphere with great quality diner food and amazing service.

Not 5 star in terms of a fine dining restaurant, but really good 24 hour diner with tons of good choices for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and dessert, friendly service, reasonable prices, and fun atmosphere.  Portion sizes are huge, but the food is also good.  My one complaint, despite friendly service, is it can be a little slow.  I do not know this for sure, but the slowness seems to come on kitchen side versus the very attentive front of house staff.

name: Wow Fried Chicken & Subs
reviews: I don't usually leave reviews, but the Beef Shawarma demands 5 stars! In combination with the spicy rice it's one of the most flavorful dishes I've ever had! Definitely going to be ordering from here a lot more as they really know how to impact deep levels of flavor. Also, huge portions! I could twice!

Great portions not to salty. Super fresh and the place is very clean. Bathrooms were spotless. Home made Humus is quite possibly the best I ever had. This is a Family owned restaurant and it is a hidden gem for authentic home made fried chicken and other specialties.
Very tasty and high quality. The staff is very nice and helpful. I tried their crispy chicken wraps and wings and both are very good. The place is very clean and was overall a great experience.

This was my first stop and I loved this place. We found the food excellent and the staff to be warm, friendly and accommodating. We'll definitely be adding this place as a regular stop on our trips to concord

The best chicken in NH hands down, whenever I'm asked "do you wanna get lunch" my go to is Wow Chicken. Can't say enough good things and also a great way to try different and new food that always impresses my mouth! Don't think about it just go or order out for yourself and make sure you order the Wow homemade chicken tenders for the best results, your tummy will thank you for it!

name: Szechuan Garden
reviews: One of my preferred spots to eat. awesome location, well kept, and excellent customer service. 5 stars!

I normally don't give out one star reviews. But this place has some serious improvement that needs to be done. It seems like the shell of something it used to be. Chicken didn't taste very fresh and it definitely was not crispy as described and there was way too much sauce! Broccoli was practically raw still and a lot of the food came out suspiciously quick. Place seems kind of beat down and it was very slow when I went in during lunch time.

Update 7/26: Order Szechuan Shredded Beef and the beef tasted like it had spoiled. Wasn't the worst thing ever, but it waste definitely hard to miss and I sent it back. Fried rice was ok, but not very fresh either. Wonton soup was good.. They replaced my meal with the chicken version of it and it was much hotter, very fresh and tasted excellent!
I really enjoyed my food and the guest I brought had never been here. The wonton soup is great. The service was very good.
Nice staff. Grace under pressure. Super busy on New Years Eve, take was right on time.
Standard NH Chinese food. Friendly staff. Can be dead or busy, depending on the day/time. Large parking lot and meeting or party space. They do kareoke.

name: The Draft Sports Bar & Grill
address: 67 S Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Server was great. We came based on the photos on the website - pool tables and darts. When we arrived there was only a “casino.” A few card tables and electronic games. I ordered the Thanksgiving sandwich which turned out to be just turkey (very good) and gravy (meh.) The menu said there was stuffing on the sandwich, but when I asked about it was told there isn’t stuffing because “it’s out of season”... Stale bread and celery is widely available any time.

Dinner at The Draft never disappoints. A unique door (it looks like a garage door) and dependable service it’s a great place to grab a drink or food. It has one of the best decks in Concord and a great view.
Friendly bartenders who really know how to make a good drink. Highly recommend the cappuccino martini!

Great place atmosphere, excellent service. Food came out a bit slow but, the funny and sweet waitress made up for it. The drinks were off the hook. The prices were reasonable. Will definitely be back again. 👍🏻

Great atmosphere, plenty of TV's for viewing your interest. Great Food. Great wait staff and Bartenders, Love the place.😉.Paul  comes up with the greatest ideas for specials, you should give them a try, you can't go wrong.The new menu has great culinary fare, you'll have to try the many new options,and the great old stand by's..the noodle bowls are to die for. YUM...  Amy will take care of your refreshment needs, all you have to do is ask..🍺🍷🍸  🍀

name: Vinnie's Pizzaria
address: 200 S Main St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Down home good pizza! No gimmicks no video games or screaming loud TVs. We are a screen free family for the most part so it's nice to come to Vinnie's and not be inundated with sight and sound pollution! Great pizza too! NYC style!

Really really good simple pizza. Had some pizza by the slice, since it was cheaper than getting my own full pie. Fiance got the sandwiches. All of it was super good. Plus they have a nice selection of cold beer :)
The guy working when we went was super hilarious too. We stopped at the end of a 7 hour driving day and were kinda loopy and he played along.

We were driving by and got a good feeling for Vinnie’s vintage place.  Simply wow!  Staff was super friendly!  
We were told that everything was made on site and that all ingredients were fresh.  
We ordered half/half Mest Lovers and Mac & Cheese.  What a Win!!!  🙌 
We’ll return for sure.  
Wifi available on site.
Delicious pizza. Worth the wait!

Sandwiches here are ok. The pie is better the next day. Ordered a cheese pie and the cheese would slide off each slice and drip with oil. Very friendly staff, but the food isn’t something to go out of your way for.

name: Dragon Star
address: 75 S Main St #1, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Is it there is amazing so you should really get your food there because there are the only ones that can get your food as good as possible.

I had a few minutes and had been craving fried rice for about two weeks so i stopped in for a quick order of house fried rice to go, I was the only customer there sitting my order but getting the pint of rice took about 15 minutes then when I get home and open it up i was immediately able to discern that they were out of fried rice at the moment and in a hasty corner cutting move to fill my order they decided to take white rice and mix it with the meat and vegetable fillings of house rice and put it in a container and send me on my way.

I am completely beside myself with what just happened, and disgusted with the manor they were willing to let their food be presented to a customer, and laughed when I saw that on their website they claimed "Dragon Star features authentic Chinese food to take out, our cooks are masters in the art of preparing the finest quality Szechuan, Hunan and Cantonese dishes."
The food is always well prepared and delightful, workers hands over good customer service. I love how neat it is and ambience. Keep up the good work.
I wish you were still open!!!.... I want your  Chinese food. Makes me said covid 19 happened
Fast and reliable, food always taste pretty good. My go to Chinese takeout in concord

name: Nina's Bistro & Sandwiches
reviews: This place has a lot of charm. I first heard about Nina's from a few friends who recommended the cevapi pocket - an authentic Yugoslavian specialty. This is now my favorite spot, and the owner is a delight to talk to. If you haven't given Nina's Bistro a try, you're missing out on a truly unique hidden gem!

I went there with my hubby and we love the place, what a great vibes! Our food was awesome, so yummy, delicious!!! Wishing their menu still available all day, after that even the restroom is sparkling clean. Thank You Nina, you are so lovely! I’ll be back!

Was on my way back down to Nashua from a half day ski trip at Ragged Mountain.  This was a perfect stop to grab a sandwich (plus there’s a gas station nearby).  The Caprese panini was perfectly toasted and tasty, though the extra order of fries that I got were just ok and somewhat overpriced at $4.

I used to visit The Sandwich Depot pretty frequently back when they were occupying this space, so I'll admit that I was a tiny bit apprehensive of a replacement with "bistro" in the name. However, I liked the mix of items on the menu and the still very reasonable prices, so I tried them for lunch today. I got the caprese salad with tuna salad and let me tell you, it was one of the best lunches I've had in a while. A perfect antidote for when you want to come off the holiday excesses with a healthy but still tasty meal. The tuna salad was flavorful, with bits of dill and finely shredded carrots; the fresh mozzarella was super soft; the tomatoes juicy; and the spring mix had just the right amount of balsamic vinaigrette drizzled. I'll definitely be back to explore the other menu options!
The steak and cheese is fantastic! Always friendly behind the counter. Will continue to get lunch here weekly!

name: Applebee's Grill + Bar
address: 260 Loudon Rd Steeplegate Mall, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Our server was the worst, his name was Joe. He was very unfriendly and quick with us. A manager had dropped off our food and we mentioned his behavior. It was very obvious with his retaliation towards us that she spoke to him. "Got me in trouble." Actually came out of his mouth. As I was paying and leaving a review, he jumped in and even asked us if we were leaving a bad one. He continued to take out his phone and say he had an app that would show him. I was very quick to leave right afterwards. That was the most uncomfortable situation I have ever been in, in a public setting.
Waitress was great, appetizers were really good. Loved the boneless honey BBQ chicken wings
The food was very good. I got a  Barbecue whiskey bacon Burger
My waitress was super! She got me everything I needed. She was AWESOME! I Don't usually like to eat alone but I was quite comfortable and really enjoyed my meal.
The half price appetizers after 9pm are a great deal.  And they always have a $1 margarita that changes every month.  Makes for an inexpensive stop after a night out.

name: Milano's Pizza
reviews: Best cheese steaks around by far this is my new sub shop in this area. Sub is packed.
Good little local pizza shop!  Subs and salads are great as well. I only do take-out there because they blast Fox "News" on TV which is horrible to have sit through.
Don't like Nicko making passes at my wife of 40 years. Food was good other wise.
Phenomenal food, great price, no tip expected but definitely deserved. Looked like a gas station when we pulled in but I am glad I listened to the reviews. Delicious salad and pizza.
Food is awesome and inexpensive! Grinders are loaded!

name: Chipotle Mexican Grill
reviews: Extremely busy store. I went at lunch time on a Monday. The employees were all very well trained to multi-task and worked great as a team to get everything order correct and I was in and out in a matter of minutes. Food was good. Portion size is huge for the bowls. I finished half.

I love this location and have been many times before and would give a 5 star every time but not this time. I ordered a burrito online and when I opened it up, the tortilla had 2 tears in it and it spilled out everywhere. Normally I would care but we ordered and we’re traveling in the car. The food was good but it was an absolute mess that I wish the employee that made it would’ve fixed the issue when they realized it was tore up. If they didn’t realize it, then they shouldn’t be working in customer service. Really disappointed.

I’ve never had an issue with this location until tonight. I ordered my food, excited about the delivery option. I was told it was to arrive at 6:35. When 6:45 came and no phone or email that it would be delayed, I drove to the location where I asked if my order had left yet as my updated door dash said at restaurant. The woman and man at the front completely ignored me after they said they didn’t know where my order was. I was standing right in front of the cash register and was blatantly ignored by TWO of the employees. I kept updating my browser and saw that it was in route to my home. I then proceeded to call the driver multiple times but kept getting sent to voicemail where a voicemail was not set up. When she arrived, she openly told my family that the order was cancelled and then sent for delivery. Not a phone call, email or update as to why our food was over 30 minutes late. I’m appalled by the employees who ignored me right in front of my face while I was being very polite. I will be very careful when I enter this location again as they do not care what so ever about the actual customer.

Waited fifteen minutes then walked inside and no acknowledgement. Wasn’t until someone else walked in got there food and told us to walk back in because the food was on the counter. Spent 27$ burritos smaller than usual and told us chips would give us a refund because they were out. No where on the site does it offer refunds or complaints. Bought chips at the gas station
First staff member didnt seem very thrilled to be at work.  Cashier was much better. Several tables were dirty, but it wasnt very busy.  Food was good

name: Veano's Italian Kitchen
address: 16 Sheep Davis Rd, Pembroke, NH 03275, USA
reviews: 20 degrees outside,but the restaurant was warm and comfortable! Our coffee was freshly brewed. Hot and tasted great. The meal was perfect too. Warm and tasty. Our service was awesome!
I have been going to Veanos since I was a kid.  Now my husband and I bring his kids.  If you're looking for consistency in food and service.  Look no further.

I used to eat here when it was on the heights back in the 80's they moved here in 2000's sometime.. best Greek restaurant I know of in the Concord area... Grinders are always fresh..chicken wings are vary good an not a fan of frozen french fries but they have good quality ones...Greek salad is vary good with nice slices of feta cheese... An dressing had a sweetness to it that is so good I could eat it on anything...always clean always good only reason I give  four stars are the people who go a few I ran into are vary rude not sure if that's Concord or Pembroke..
Thank you Veano, we love your food! And plan on ordering again! Love the baked scallops!

Enjoyed a great dinner here. Didn't take pics of the food but all were great.
Stuffed Cabbage with meat sauce
Meatloaf Dinner
Haddock au Gratin
Yummy 
Italian Lemon Creme Cake...melt in your mouth...yummmm!

name: Chief's Place
reviews: Never had a bad meal over to Chief's Place. Our pizza took a bit longer than expected but the results were fantastic! An expertly cooked pizza! Even though we had a bunch of toppings the pizza was cooked evenly throughout, not raw in the middle, not burnt and not overly greasy. Perfect!
On a diet? NO problem.....delicious broiled seafood and salads.
Amazing food and a wide variety too. Friendly staff and comfortable restaurant seating.
They make great sandwiches and calzones! Will definitely be going back !
Very good food , meatball sub was tasty, yummy steak fries,

name: Washington Street Cafe
reviews: I just love their food. I always get great service there. The place is well kept and the employees are always nice. Will visit here again.
Fresh salads. Hot meals. Homemade soups. All natural deli meats for wraps or artisan bread.
Best catering! Great Mediterranean food and sandwiches!
very very close to 5 star
Went here for lunch quick service employee was very nice. I got the unique lala chicken wrap. It was delicious great for a quick lunch stop.

name: 1896 Grill & Tavern
address: 1 Beaver Meadow Dr, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Was very excelent service made my mixed drink the right kind of strong and a quesdilla that is better then any other restaurant ive had one at, there golf staff was very proper and knew how to have good customer service as well as being able to have a good time with the indoor simulator!!!!!!!
Terrific comfort food. Highly recommend.
Do it. You’ll thank me later. Yummy food and great service make the perfect combo.
Friendly staff, delicious burgers!
Had an amazing time.

name: bāked Cafe & Bakery
address: 249 Sheep Davis Rd, Concord, NH 03301, USA
reviews: Stopped in for Breakfast and left with lunch to! Pin drop this place. Fresh and clean food with some interesting twist in normal flavor.   I'll be back some day!

Normally I would give this a 5-star rating but my last visit was substandard. the place is always super busy because it's normally good so I got there very early and I was the only one in line before noon ordered my usual which was the turkey gobbler. Usually takes just a couple minutes to get my meal, but this time it took nearly 25 minutes and when I got to go it wasn't the usual warm delicious turkey dinner like meal. Instead it was akin to a cold deli sandwich with cold stuffing and cold hard cheese. Even this gravy side was more gel than gravy. This isn't normal so I was very surprised and very disappointed. I don't know if they're just short-handed this is day or what but it was quite a let down.

Thank you for your high quality business. Yesterday my branch ordered different variety of menu options and it was superb, quick prepered,  fresh ingridients and an exclusive pinch of house made souses.

Clam chowder was terrible. Watery with no flavor. BLT was good but it's hard to screw up a BLT. Didn't get my pickles. Salted caramel shortbread bar needed help. Shortbread was awful and dry. Kind of tasted stale. Shortbread mixture needed a ton more butter and a bit more sugar. Not enough good things to make me go back.

This was our second time eating here - first time was great but the second time we got take-out I was HORRIFIED to find a stinkbug in my Reuben sandwich. I took a bite of the sandwich and as I pulled away I saw the body of a bug on the edge where I would have taken my second bite. I get smaller bugs can sneak in (e.g., fruit flies) but this insect was almost the size of a quarter. It is alarming that the bug was right on the top of the coleslaw in plain sight NOT buried - so little care and observation was taken while preparing the food. Sorry Bāked, this is unacceptable and I would be sickened if this happened to someone else.

name: Dallas Pizza
address: 156 N State St, Concord, NH 03301, USA
