reviews: Great local pizza joint with friendly staff, good food, and a small but nice dining area.

Greek style pizza crust has always been a favorite of mine and Dallas makes their pizzas just like I want it. The crust isn't overly doughy or so big that it takes over the pie. 
Also tried their shaved steak sub, not too greasy like some places serve up which is nice.
Friendly staff (family owned?) that is always courteous.
Amazing pizza and burgers, they also have really good pastas.
Their subs are stuffed with what your order. I like the steak and mushrooms. Bread is good for subs, but I do not like the bread for the pizza as much.

Hoped for a quick walk in to order a couple small calzones for take out around dinner time. Did not appear to be very busy but order took 30 minutes to come out so call in advance. Not very large dining area. Price was a little high $13.00 for a small calzone. Food was very good though in the end makes it worth it.

name: Wrap City Sandwich Co.
reviews: I've ordered take-out several times now from Wrap City, and every time, the food has been absolutely fantastic. It always tastes fresh, it's always well-made, the staff is always very friendly and helpful, and the location itself is very clean, and well put together. So far, I've made it a point to try a different sandwich or wrap each visit, but I've become a big fan of The Warrior. Their chips are very unique, and very tasty. Pricing is also very competitive, although they could be charging twice as much as they do, and I'd still pay, since their food is VERY good. I highly recommend Wrap City if you need something quick and/or casual.

This restaurant is amazing. It was a little bit of a wait, but so worth it. You must try their honey mustard, it is the best and tastes amazing on their chips. I came with my family and everyone loved it. The food tastes amazing and is nice and fresh. The place was very clean and comfortable. I definitely recommend this and will be coming back.

Friendly service. Clean restaurant and bathrooms. Delicious food with so many options and willing to make custom orders, too. The kettle baked chips are sprinkled with what tastes like a cinnamon sugar and is the most amazing taste combination. Cannot recommend enough. Always excited.to go back! Must try!!!

Had the Philly’s Best and it was terrific! Steak and toppings were amazing, the cheese wiz, although a bit much in places, was a nice addition to the overall taste. Chips were far better than the mass produced garbage from Lays. There are so many different things on the menu that I want to try, that I’ll definitely be back! Can’t wait to see this place grow and expand.
Nice place, good food with excellent service, I did not find it on Instagram, I believe Google did not put the address.  recommend the venue

name: Donatello's Pizza
reviews: We came to this spot for dinner. my friend recommended this place.  Well, it was a winning. we were warmly welcomed by the crew  and we felt fantastic. The meal was tasty. We enjoyed every moment and we shall absolutely come back again. Recommended.
Great pizza, great people, great service. I ordered Chicken Fajita Pizza with extra cheese and it was delicious.

We have gotten delivery from this restaurant for years and we have always had such great service and great food as well. The staff that we have encountered have always been very friendly! We always get the same girl who does the deliveries and she is awesome! I always forget to ask for her name, but she has red hair and is super friendly!
This place is awesome! Super friendly folks and outstanding food! I love Donatello's!
We enjoyed the NY style pizza, chicken fingers  and steak and cheese sub. It's nice to have housemade sauces and pizza dough.

name: Papa Gino's
reviews: The best chain pizza place ever. Totally affordable and great quality.

Haven't been there in a while. Was a bit disappointed in the pizza. Not much cheese but more than enough sauce on the pizza. It may have just been the evening so I won't judge on this one trip. One other issue was they never called us up to the counter for pizza and when my daughter inquired they handed her a box saying it was her pizza, we were eating in, do she took it. While she was eating it she realized a customer was complaining because her pizza wasn't ready. My daughter looked down at the receipt on the box and it was the take out order box!
Associates were great. Very pleasant. Great food.

Food is good, however was informed this location will no longer honor any coupons from ads or their website.

At the current price points, I suspect this place will lose more customers.
Place has gone way down hill. The entire company itself has. Food quality is way down from what it use to be. Also they cant even properly maintain there building.
